details: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a vibrant 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, powerful triple 12 MP camera setup, and ample 128GB storage. With a 4000 mAh battery, it ensures long-lasting performance throughout the day.

The Apple iPhone 13 boasts a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, a powerful dual 12 MP camera system, and generous 256GB storage. With a 3100 mAh battery, it delivers a seamless and efficient user experience.

The Xiaomi Mi 11 features a massive 6.81-inch AMOLED display, an impressive triple 108 MP camera setup, and ample 128GB storage. With a 4600 mAh battery, it provides a superior multimedia and photography experience.

The Sony Xperia 5 III features a sleek 6.1-inch OLED display, a powerful triple 12 MP camera system, and generous 256GB storage. With a 4500 mAh battery, it ensures a seamless and captivating user experience.

The Huawei P40 Pro showcases a 6.58-inch OLED display, an innovative Penta 50 MP camera setup, and ample 256GB storage. With a 4200 mAh battery, it offers a revolutionary photography and multimedia experience.
